Summary: saw same object approx 2 years apart
divs: sighting details#1. was driving with girlfriend to my parents house when i noticed "mars" in east sky. orangy color, bit bigger than a star. we were driving towards it along a hilly rural road. came over one of the hills and started to think it was moving. gf confirmed it was. moving from north to south very slowly. kind of weird. we were watching it and suddenly it was very close traveling towards us just south of the road. it had a blue and red light about it. we got a bit panicy. the gf was yelling for me to pull over,dog was barking. i couldn't get my head down low enough to see it through her window but i could see the light coming down on an angle running along the field. the light didn't feel "right" somehow. gf said it looked like a football. it just kept going west out of view. i didn't stop though i was going so slowly up a hill in too big a gear that car was trying to stall. we pulled over in closed bakery parking lot in greenbank and i grabbed a beer from trunk while we sorta freaked about what had happened. i tried to call my aunt who lived along that road at the time to see if they had noticed anything, but they hadn't. we realised that the road had been empty of cars (as far as we could remember) while this was going on. we both agreed that the thing, the experience felt wrong. out of place. # 2. approx 2 years later i had convinced myself that i must have been overly excited and actually seen a helicoptor or something. i was hanging with a mountain biking buddy after a ride through the forest just south of where original experiance took place. it had gotten dark so we said our goodbyes and left. i headed south down dirt road following my buddy til he went east at first "real" road. as soon as he turned i saw an object hanging in the sky about 2 klicks south. it was that same blue\red thing. i thought, great! now i can put this to rest! i continued south past "real" road onto dirt again. almost as soon as i had thought, "great! etc", this "tube" or column of light came shooting down at about 45 degree angle from object. i immediatly felt startled and nervous. as i was driving towards this thing i was trying to hear a sound or make out some familiar shape. nothing. then i noticed 2 people on road ahead. i drove up to them they were 2 ladies. i pointed to the object and asked, "is that a plane? what is it?" one of the ladies said,"probably da". it was so weird i didn't know what to do. i drove a black van at the time so maybe they were scared by me but it was all so strange. i just drove away. the thing started to follow me. the white light was out by this time but as i would look at it the thing almost seemed like 2 objects. one blue, one red. i was really flying down the road by this time in full panic mode. it just kinda sat there beside me. the road ended and i turned right (west). it seemed to stop and just sit there. it had 2 orange lights at this point. just sitting like 2 big orange eggs in my rear view. i am very sure that this was not any sort of airplane or helicoptor. it was wrong for here. if that makes any sense.
